allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add restaurant map feature with wine glass icons and pairing discovery pre-selection

- Implement interactive restaurant map using Leaflet and OpenStreetMap
- Add custom wine glass shaped markers in wine red color
- Display restaurant popups with wine count and "Pair Now" button
- Fix pre-selection flow so clicking map restaurant pre-fills pairing tool dropdown
- Add restaurants sidebar with clickable list items
- Sync preSelectedRestaurant prop to PairingDiscovery component state

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
